Hlomla Dandala (amụrụ na 22 Septemba 1974) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-egosi telivishọn, na onye nduzi.

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Derek Nyathi na Isidingo (1998 - 2001), aha Jacob Makhubu na Jacob's Cross (site na 2007), na onye na-eme ihe ngosi nke eziokwu All You Need Is Love site na 2002 ruo 2003. Ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Rockville dị ka Gomorrah, onye isi na-emegide oge nke atọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ, na ihe nkiri nke e.tv, Scandal! dị ka Kingsley Siseko Langa site na 2016 ruo 2019.
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2018, Dandala na-eme ihe nkiri na The River across Sindi Dlathu (onye na-eme Lindiwe) dị ka di ya, Kọmishọna Zweli Dikana
Dandala bụ nwa Mvume Dandala ma nwee nwanne nwanyị Gqibelo. Ọ na-asụ asụsụ ise: Afrikaans, Bekee, Xhosa, Sesotho na Zulu.
